presentation: I’m Nadia your fitness assistant. I will help you during your training. I can find the right program for your goal, find a sport center around you and even help you finding the right equipment or sport buddy. How can I help you today ?
weightt: Ok ! Can you give me your weight
overweight: but I still can help you :wink: ! I will folow you during all your process don’t worry mate.
askfrequency: How often would you like to work out?
minute: How much time are you ready to work out ?
questionsatisfied: Are you satisfied with this list ?
thanks: I’m glad I have helped you.
anythingelse: Can I do anything else for you ?
outfit: Of course ! here some good outfit for your training. Hope you’ll find something that sute you.
end: If you need any help don’t be shy to ask. I’m here for helping you. If you do it right you’ll be happy of what you see in the mirror
